The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.

Comments_Questions: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
Comments_List: I learned important concepts related to becoming an Air Force officer.
I learned about a variety of topics that will be important in the future as an Air Force officer, ranging from problem solving skills to the types of leadership.
I better understood what some of the skills are that make up a good leader.

It is well organized and covers relevant concepts for what our future careers entail. I think the weakness is that it leaves the majority of the work in the students' hands and therefore, is not as well-taught.

The course was very interesting and the topics were very applicable. I liked how we had to give the presentations about the topics of the course because this system gave us the opportunity to practice public speaking.
Nice that cadets teach each other, but more input from cadre would have been good.
It's a good class, I liked how students presented the information every lecture instead of the same cadre member.
Yes, I would recommend the course to another student because it well-structured and taught us very applicable information.
If you are in AFROTC, yes!
